title: Ocean and San All Day Shirt in Sequoia Brown
content:
Ocean and San, makers of casual cycling apparel, just released their short-sleeved All Day Shirt in Sequoia Brown. Racing kits are for racing; the Ocean and San All Day Shirt is for everything else. The All Day Shirt has the comfort and style of a casual shirt, with the performance and functionality of a traditional cycling jersey. These riding shirts are sewn in California and feature 85/15 Polycotton DriRelease fabric with 30+ UPF Sun Protection.

Check out more at Ocean and San.
